timeline.bodyText: I think we need putObject(Routing.EDGE_BASED, Helper.toObject(edgeBasedParam)) here (previously this code relied on the string being converted to boolean... This is a bit ugly code, and will be gone in #1958 :)
timeline.author: easbar

timeline.bodyText: This is dangerous, I think if we pass "1" here, e.g. getInt("prepare.min_network_size", 102) will return 102.
timeline.author: easbar
